paymentRefund.subject: Payment Refund - e-consult.uz
paymentRefund.title: Payment Refund
paymentRefund.body: Your payment has been refunded for the following cancelled appointment:
paymentRefund.processingInfo: The refund will be processed according to your payment method's standard processing times.
paymentRefund.support: If you have any questions about this refund, please contact our support team.

adviceNotification.warning: Note: Always follow your advisor's instructions when taking actions.

verification.subject: Verify Your Email - e-consult.uz
verification.title: e-consult.uz Email Verification
verification.body: Thank you for registering with e-consult.uz! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verification.text: Please verify your email by clicking on the following link: {{verificationLink}}
verification.altText: If the button doesn't work, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
verification.expiry: This link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.ignore: If you didn't create an account with e-consult.uz, please ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset Your Password - e-consult.uz
passwordReset.title: e-consult.uz Password Reset
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new password:
passwordReset.text: You requested a password reset. Please click the following link to reset your password: {{resetLink}}
passwordReset.altText: If the button doesn't work, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
passwordReset.expiry: This link will expire in 10 minutes.
passwordReset.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email or contact support if you're concerned.
